name: Wands Alliances
abstract: Take up your wands. Summon your allies. Destroy your enemies. Wands Alliances is a 3v3, team-based multiplayer competitive VR gaming experience where you engage in fast-paced magic duels.

detail.app_languages: English, Korean, Italian, French, Spanish, German, Japanese, Russian, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
Wands Alliances patch notes (client version 1.1.5 -> 1.1.6) :magic_wand:
1. Changed matchmaking to where it now places a player in an open game right away if available, and if not, asks if you want to be placed in a game with bots instead (and doesnâ€™t add you automatically)
2. Added new challenges with six new corresponding borders and seven new titles
3. Changed icon for Healing Nova to make it easier to distinguish from other spells
4. Removed a few timers from the tutorial and increased the length of others to make them easier to complete
5. Moved level rewards for challenges and added a pop up when levelling + what you unlocked for better readability
6. Add friend UI improved
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4
